vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Πρίσκα, -ας, ἡ (Lat.), and Πρίσκιλλα, -ης, ἡ, Prisca: Rom_16:3, 1Co_16:19, 2Ti_4:19; Priscilla: Act_18:2; Act_18:18; Act_18:26; the wife of Aquila, vs. Ἀκύλας.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.18.2; married to Aquila (G0207); also called Prisca at Rom.16.3; 2x
§ see also Πρόσκιλλα, Prisca, Priscilla (Proper name), Rom. 16:3; 1Cor. 16:19; 2Tim. 4:19*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
百基拉 这个陰性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "遠古"
一位基督徒婦女, 亞居拉的妻子(羅 16:3; 林前 16:19; 提後 4:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
百基拉 这个阴性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "远古"
一位基督徒妇女, 亚居拉的妻子(罗 16:3; 林前 16:19; 提后 4:19)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Bơ-rít-ca là vợ của A-qui-la A-qui-la, « bà già » nguồn gốc: tiếng La-tinh
